author: ggregory
msg: Refactor for a new test to check that we can make multiple connections to an FTP server via the underlying Commons Net code. This is OK with FTP but not with FTPS. The FTPS test is not committed yet.

author: myrnavl
msg: adjusting the test so every commit following a delete is followed in turn
by a call to wait for post-commit threads to finish.

msg: SHINDIG-1757 Defer getting the singleton user prefs in opensocial-templates feature until inline execution of gadgets.Prefs.setDefaultPrefs_ is called.
